##Datalitex

Datalitex is a Python library developed by Vinay Desai for data analysts and Python users who want a powerful, all-in-one toolkit to clean, analyze, manipulate, and visualize data directly from CSV files or pandas DataFrames.

---

## ğŸŒŸ Features

- ğŸš¿ Automatic data cleaning (nulls, column stripping, duplicate removal)
- ğŸ” Row/column filtering, custom querying, and type conversion
- ğŸ“Š Visualizations: histograms, scatter, bar, heatmap, pairplot, pie, and more
- ğŸ“ˆ GroupBy summaries, pivot tables, and crosstab reports
- ğŸ§ª Outlier detection and removal (IQR, Z-Score)
- ğŸ§  Feature importance (correlation and ANOVA)
- ğŸ§¼ Encoding (Label, One-hot), Normalization & Standardization
- ğŸ§¾ Export cleaned/transformed data to CSV

---

## ğŸ“¦ Installation

```bash
pip install datalitex
